title: LFT Plat 5 Jg/Sup
body:
IGN: zPONYv 
Just looking for a 5's team that is serious about winning and plays very frequently, I can be hit and miss in some games, but would love to just play some games out as I am not too fond of solo queue. Would prefer if I could get in a team that is Plat + so people are on a similar skill level.

Have all coms platforms, Discord, TS and Skype.

Have like 1K ranked games this season though and looking to main a role, good communicator too.

replies.body:
Hey my team is looking for great players and would love you to join our team 

I've added you to discuss

Urantic Powerhouse Captain And Manager,
 UP Vespik

Hey my team is interested in recruiting you and would like to discuss about you joining the roster 

I've added you and we'll discuss

Urantic Powerhouse Captain And Manager,
UP Vespik
